document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R23-002
Act Authorizing Contracting for Portfolio Monitoring Services
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 14th day of March , 2023, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and
the sovereign authority of the Pueblo is vested in its Council and Governor; and
the Pueblo has trust funds administered by the Bureau of Indian Affairs; and
the Pueblo has determined the need to contract with a portfolio monitoring company with special expertise to review the Pueblo's trust funds and investigate any potential claims.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled, "ACT AUTHORIZING CONTRACTING FOR PORTFOLIO MONITORING SERVICES."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on March 14, 2023, at a meeting with a vote of 9 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R23-002 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 14th day of March , 2023, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4 (c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

attachment.heading: ACT AUTHORIZING CONTRACTING FOR PORTFOLIO MONITORING SERVICES

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "ACT AUTHORIZING CONTRACTING FOR PORTFOLIO MONITORING SERVICES" ("the Act").

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Act is to authorize and direct the Governor of the Pueblo to negotiate a contract with a portfolio monitoring company with specialized experience to monitor the Pueblo's trust fund accounts and investigate any potential claims involving investment of the Pueblo's trust accounts.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: the Pueblo has trust funds administered by the Bureau of Indian Affairs.

the Pueblo has determined the need to contract with a portfolio monitoring company with special expertise to review the Pueblo's trust funds and investigate any potential claims involving investment of the Pueblo's trust accounts.

The Governor is directed and authorized to negotiate and execute a contract with a portfolio monitoring company with specialized expertise to review the Pueblo's trust funds accounts and investigate any potential claims regarding the investment of the Pueblo's trust funds.
The provision of such services shall be provided on a contingency-fee basis.
Sole source contracting is authorized for a qualified company.
